data.textUthmani: كٓهيعٓصٓ
data.wordByWord: كٓهيعٓصٓ [Kaaf Ha Ya Ain Sad]
data.transliteration: Kaf-ha-ya-AAayn-sad

data.textUthmani: ذِكْرُ رَحْمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبْدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ
data.wordByWord: ذِكْرُ [(A) mention] رَحْمَتِ [(of the) Mercy] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] عَبْدَهُۥ [(to) His servant] زَكَرِيَّآ [Zakariya]
data.transliteration: Thikru rahmati rabbika AAabdahuzakariyya

data.textUthmani: إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيًّا
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] نَادَىٰ [he called] رَبَّهُۥ [(to) his Lord] نِدَآءً [a call ] خَفِيًّۭا [secret]
data.transliteration: Ith nada rabbahu nidaankhafiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] إِنِّى [Indeed, [I]] وَهَنَ [(have) weakened] ٱلْعَظْمُ [my bones] مِنِّى [my bones] وَٱشْتَعَلَ [and flared] ٱلرَّأْسُ [(my) head] شَيْبًۭا [(with) white] وَلَمْ [and not] أَكُنۢ [I have been] بِدُعَآئِكَ [in (my) supplication (to) You] رَبِّ [my Lord] شَقِيًّۭا [unblessed]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi innee wahana alAAathmuminnee washtaAAala arra/su shayban walam akunbiduAAa-ika rabbi shaqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِنِّى [And indeed, I] خِفْتُ [[I] fear] ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ [the successors] مِن [after me] وَرَآءِى [after me] وَكَانَتِ [and is] ٱمْرَأَتِى [my wife] عَاقِرًۭا [barren] فَهَبْ [So give] لِى [[to] me] مِن [from] لَّدُنكَ [Yourself] وَلِيًّۭا [an heir]
data.transliteration: Wa-innee khiftu almawaliya min wara-eewakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunkawaliyya

data.textUthmani: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَرِثُنِى [Who will inherit me] وَيَرِثُ [and inherit] مِنْ [from] ءَالِ [(the) family] يَعْقُوبَ ۖ [(of) Yaqub] وَٱجْعَلْهُ [And make him] رَبِّ [my Lord] رَضِيًّۭا [pleasing]
data.transliteration: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqoobawajAAalhu rabbi radiyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ [O Zakariya] إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نُبَشِّرُكَ [[We] give you glad tidings] بِغُلَـٰمٍ [of a boy] ٱسْمُهُۥ [his name] يَحْيَىٰ [(will be) Yahya] لَمْ [not] نَجْعَل [We (have) assigned] لَّهُۥ [[for] it] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] سَمِيًّۭا [(this) name]
data.transliteration: Ya zakariyya innanubashshiruka bighulamin ismuhu yahya lamnajAAal lahu min qablu samiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] أَنَّىٰ [How] يَكُونُ [can] لِى [I have] غُلَـٰمٌۭ [a boy] وَكَانَتِ [while is] ٱمْرَأَتِى [my wife] عَاقِرًۭا [barren] وَقَدْ [and indeed] بَلَغْتُ [I have reached] مِنَ [of] ٱلْكِبَرِ [the old age] عِتِيًّۭا [extreme]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi anna yakoonu leeghulamun wakanati imraatee AAaqiran waqadbalaghtu mina alkibari AAitiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] كَذَٰلِكَ [Thus] قَالَ [said] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] هُوَ ['It] عَلَىَّ [(is) easy for Me] هَيِّنٌۭ [(is) easy for Me] وَقَدْ [and certainly] خَلَقْتُكَ [I (have) created you] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] وَلَمْ [while not] تَكُ [you were] شَيْـًۭٔا [anything.']
data.transliteration: Qala kathalika qalarabbuka huwa AAalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walamtaku shay-a

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةً ۚ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍ سَوِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱجْعَل [Make] لِّىٓ [for me] ءَايَةًۭ ۚ [a sign] قَالَ [He said] ءَايَتُكَ [Your sign] أَلَّا [(is) that not] تُكَلِّمَ [you will speak] ٱلنَّاسَ [(to) the people] ثَلَـٰثَ [(for) three] لَيَالٍۢ [nights] سَوِيًّۭا [sound]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi ijAAal lee ayatan qalaayatuka alla tukallima annasa thalathalayalin sawiyya

data.textUthmani: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَخَرَجَ [Then he came out] عَلَىٰ [to] قَوْمِهِۦ [his people] مِنَ [from] ٱلْمِحْرَابِ [the prayer chamber] فَأَوْحَىٰٓ [and he signaled] إِلَيْهِمْ [to them] أَن [to] سَبِّحُوا۟ [glorify (Allah)] بُكْرَةًۭ [(in) the morning] وَعَشِيًّۭا [and (in) the evening]
data.transliteration: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi mina almihrabifaawha ilayhim an sabbihoo bukratan waAAashiyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ [O Yahya] خُذِ [Hold] ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ [the Scripture] بِقُوَّةٍۢ ۖ [with strength] وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ [And We gave him] ٱلْحُكْمَ [[the] wisdom] صَبِيًّۭا [(when he was) a child]
data.transliteration: Ya yahya khuthialkitaba biquwwatin waataynahu alhukmasabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَحَنَانًا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةً ۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَحَنَانًۭا [And affection] مِّن [from] لَّدُنَّا [Us] وَزَكَوٰةًۭ ۖ [and purity] وَكَانَ [and he was] تَقِيًّۭا [righteous]
data.transliteration: Wahananan min ladunnawazakatan wakana taqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَبَرًّۢا [And dutiful] بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ [to his parents] وَلَمْ [and not] يَكُن [he was] جَبَّارًا [a tyrant] عَصِيًّۭا [disobedient]
data.transliteration: Wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaranAAasiyya

data.textUthmani: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَسَلَـٰمٌ [And peace be] عَلَيْهِ [upon him] يَوْمَ [(the) day] وُلِدَ [he was born] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) day] يَمُوتُ [he dies] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) day] يُبْعَثُ [he will be raised] حَيًّۭا [alive]
data.transliteration: Wasalamun AAalayhi yawma wulidawayawma yamootu wayawma yubAAathu hayya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] مَرْيَمَ [Maryam] إِذِ [when] ٱنتَبَذَتْ [she withdrew] مِنْ [from] أَهْلِهَا [her family] مَكَانًۭا [(to) a place] شَرْقِيًّۭا [eastern]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabimaryama ithi intabathat min ahliha makanansharqiyya

data.textUthmani: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًا سَوِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ [Then she took] مِن [from them] دُونِهِمْ [from them] حِجَابًۭا [a screen] فَأَرْسَلْنَآ [Then We sent] إِلَيْهَا [to her] رُوحَنَا [Our Spirit] فَتَمَثَّلَ [then he assumed for her the likeness] لَهَا [then he assumed for her the likeness] بَشَرًۭا [(of) a man] سَوِيًّۭا [well-proportioned]
data.transliteration: Fattakhathat min doonihim hijabanfaarsalna ilayha roohanafatamaththala laha basharan sawiyya

words.translation: then he assumed for her the likeness
then he assumed for her the likeness

data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] أَعُوذُ [[I] seek refuge] بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [with the Most Gracious] مِنكَ [from you] إِن [if] كُنتَ [you are] تَقِيًّۭا [God fearing]
data.transliteration: Qalat innee aAAoothu birrahmaniminka in kunta taqiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًا زَكِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَنَا۠ [I am] رَسُولُ [a Messenger] رَبِّكِ [(from) your Lord] لِأَهَبَ [that I (may) bestow] لَكِ [on you] غُلَـٰمًۭا [a son] زَكِيًّۭا [pure]
data.transliteration: Qala innama ana rasoolurabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaman zakiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [She said] أَنَّىٰ [How] يَكُونُ [can be] لِى [for me] غُلَـٰمٌۭ [a son] وَلَمْ [when not] يَمْسَسْنِى [has touched me] بَشَرٌۭ [a man] وَلَمْ [and not] أَكُ [I am] بَغِيًّۭا [unchaste]
data.transliteration: Qalat anna yakoonu lee ghulamunwalam yamsasnee basharun walam aku baghiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ ۖ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةً مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًا مَّقْضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] كَذَٰلِكِ [Thus] قَالَ [said] رَبُّكِ [your Lord] هُوَ ['It] عَلَىَّ [(is) for Me] هَيِّنٌۭ ۖ [easy] وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ [and so that We will make him] ءَايَةًۭ [a sign] لِّلنَّاسِ [for the mankind] وَرَحْمَةًۭ [and a Mercy] مِّنَّا ۚ [from Us] وَكَانَ [And (it) is] أَمْرًۭا [a matter] مَّقْضِيًّۭا [decreed.']
data.transliteration: Qala kathaliki qalarabbuki huwa AAalayya hayyinun walinajAAalahu ayatan linnasiwarahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyya

words.translation: and so that We will make him

data.textUthmani: ۞ فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتْ بِهِۦ مَكَانًا قَصِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ۞ فَحَمَلَتْهُ [So she conceived him] فَٱنتَبَذَتْ [and she withdrew] بِهِۦ [with him] مَكَانًۭا [(to) a place] قَصِيًّۭا [remote]
data.transliteration: Fahamalat-hu fantabathatbihi makanan qasiyya

data.textUthmani: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًا مَّنسِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَأَجَآءَهَا [Then drove her] ٱلْمَخَاضُ [the pains of childbirth] إِلَىٰ [to] جِذْعِ [(the) trunk] ٱلنَّخْلَةِ [(of) the date-palm] قَالَتْ [She said] يَـٰلَيْتَنِى [O! I wish] مِتُّ [I (had) died] قَبْلَ [before] هَـٰذَا [this] وَكُنتُ [and I was] نَسْيًۭا [(in) oblivion] مَّنسِيًّۭا [forgotten]
data.transliteration: Faajaaha almakhadu ilajithAAi annakhlati qalat ya laytaneemittu qabla hatha wakuntu nasyan mansiyya

data.textUthmani: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَنَادَىٰهَا [So cried to her] مِن [from] تَحْتِهَآ [beneath her] أَلَّا [That (do) not] تَحْزَنِى [grieve] قَدْ [verily] جَعَلَ [(has) placed] رَبُّكِ [your Lord] تَحْتَكِ [beneath you] سَرِيًّۭا [a stream]
data.transliteration: Fanadaha min tahtihaalla tahzanee qad jaAAala rabbuki tahtakisariyya

data.textUthmani: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًا جَنِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَهُزِّىٓ [And shake] إِلَيْكِ [towards you] بِجِذْعِ [(the) trunk] ٱلنَّخْلَةِ [(of) the date-palm] تُسَـٰقِطْ [it will drop] عَلَيْكِ [upon you] رُطَبًۭا [fresh dates] جَنِيًّۭا [ripe]
data.transliteration: Wahuzzee ilayki bijithAAi annakhlatitusaqit AAalayki rutaban janiyya

data.textUthmani: فَكُلِى وَٱشْرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيْنًا ۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلْبَشَرِ أَحَدًا فَقُولِىٓ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ صَوْمًا فَلَنْ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنسِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَكُلِى [So eat] وَٱشْرَبِى [and drink] وَقَرِّى [and cool] عَيْنًۭا ۖ [(your) eyes] فَإِمَّا [And if] تَرَيِنَّ [you see] مِنَ [from] ٱلْبَشَرِ [human being] أَحَدًۭا [anyone] فَقُولِىٓ [then say] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] نَذَرْتُ [[I] have vowed] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [to the Most Gracious] صَوْمًۭا [a fast] فَلَنْ [so not] أُكَلِّمَ [I will speak] ٱلْيَوْمَ [today] إِنسِيًّۭا [(to any) human being]
data.transliteration: Fakulee washrabee waqarree AAaynanfa-imma tarayinna mina albashari ahadan faqooleeinnee nathartu lirrahmani sawmanfalan okallima alyawma insiyya

data.textUthmani: فَأَتَتْ بِهِۦ قَوْمَهَا تَحْمِلُهُۥ ۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ لَقَدْ جِئْتِ شَيْـًٔا فَرِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَأَتَتْ [Then she came] بِهِۦ [with him] قَوْمَهَا [(to) her people] تَحْمِلُهُۥ ۖ [carrying him] قَالُوا۟ [They said] يَـٰمَرْيَمُ [O Maryam] لَقَدْ [Certainly] جِئْتِ [you (have) brought] شَيْـًۭٔا [an amazing thing] فَرِيًّۭا [an amazing thing]
data.transliteration: Faatat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhuqaloo ya maryamu laqad ji/ti shay-an fariyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ هَـٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ [O sister] هَـٰرُونَ [(of) Harun] مَا [Not] كَانَ [was] أَبُوكِ [your father] ٱمْرَأَ [an evil man] سَوْءٍۢ [an evil man] وَمَا [and not] كَانَتْ [was] أُمُّكِ [your mother] بَغِيًّۭا [unchaste]
data.transliteration: Ya okhta haroona ma kanaabooki imraa saw-in wama kanat ommuki baghiyya

data.textUthmani: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَأَشَارَتْ [Then she pointed] إِلَيْهِ ۖ [to him] قَالُوا۟ [They said] كَيْفَ [How] نُكَلِّمُ [(can) we speak] مَن [(to one) who] كَانَ [is] فِى [in] ٱلْمَهْدِ [the cradle] صَبِيًّۭا [a child]
data.transliteration: Faasharat ilayhi qaloo kayfanukallimu man kana fee almahdi sabiyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنِّى [Indeed, I am] عَبْدُ [a slave] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] ءَاتَىٰنِىَ [He gave me] ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ [the Scripture] وَجَعَلَنِى [and made me] نَبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Qala innee AAabdu Allahi ataniyaalkitaba wajaAAalanee nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوْصَـٰنِى بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمْتُ حَيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَجَعَلَنِى [And He (has) made me] مُبَارَكًا [blessed] أَيْنَ [wherever] مَا [wherever] كُنتُ [I am] وَأَوْصَـٰنِى [and has enjoined (on) me] بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ [[of] the prayer] وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ [and zakah] مَا [as long as I am] دُمْتُ [as long as I am] حَيًّۭا [alive]
data.transliteration: WajaAAalanee mubarakan aynamakuntu waawsanee bissalati wazzakatima dumtu hayya

data.textUthmani: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِى وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْنِى جَبَّارًا شَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَبَرًّۢا [And dutiful] بِوَٰلِدَتِى [to my mother] وَلَمْ [and not] يَجْعَلْنِى [He (has) made me] جَبَّارًۭا [insolent] شَقِيًّۭا [unblessed]
data.transliteration: Wabarran biwalidatee walam yajAAalneejabbaran shaqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ [And peace (be)] عَلَىَّ [on me] يَوْمَ [(the) day] وُلِدتُّ [I was born] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) day] أَمُوتُ [I will die] وَيَوْمَ [and (the) Day] أُبْعَثُ [I will be raised] حَيًّۭا [alive]
data.transliteration: Wassalamu AAalayya yawmawulidtu wayawma amootu wayawma obAAathu hayya

data.textUthmani: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: ذَٰلِكَ [That] عِيسَى [(was) Isa] ٱبْنُ [(the) son] مَرْيَمَ ۚ [(of) Maryam] قَوْلَ [a statement] ٱلْحَقِّ [(of) truth] ٱلَّذِى [that which] فِيهِ [about it] يَمْتَرُونَ [they dispute]
data.transliteration: Thalika AAeesa ibnu maryamaqawla alhaqqi allathee feehi yamtaroon

data.textUthmani: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٍ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] كَانَ [(it) is] لِلَّهِ [for Allah] أَن [that] يَتَّخِذَ [He should take] مِن [any son] وَلَدٍۢ ۖ [any son] سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ ۚ [Glory be to Him] إِذَا [When] قَضَىٰٓ [He decrees] أَمْرًۭا [a matter] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يَقُولُ [He says] لَهُۥ [to it] كُن [Be] فَيَكُونُ [and it is]
data.transliteration: Ma kana lillahi anyattakhitha min waladin subhanahu itha qadaamran fa-innama yaqoolu lahu kun fayakoon

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] رَبِّى [(is) my Lord] وَرَبُّكُمْ [and your Lord] فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ [so worship Him] هَـٰذَا [This] صِرَٰطٌۭ [(is) a path] مُّسْتَقِيمٌۭ [straight]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna Allaha rabbee warabbukum faAAbudoohuhatha siratun mustaqeem

data.textUthmani: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن مَّشْهَدِ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: فَٱخْتَلَفَ [But differed] ٱلْأَحْزَابُ [the sects] مِنۢ [from among them] بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ [from among them] فَوَيْلٌۭ [so woe] لِّلَّذِينَ [to those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] مِن [from] مَّشْهَدِ [(the) witnessing] يَوْمٍ [(of) a Day] عَظِيمٍ [great]
data.transliteration: Fakhtalafa al-ahzabumin baynihim fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min mashhadiyawmin AAatheem

data.textUthmani: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ وَأَبْصِرْ يَوْمَ يَأْتُونَنَا ۖ لَـٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: أَسْمِعْ [How they will hear] بِهِمْ [How they will hear] وَأَبْصِرْ [and how (they will) see] يَوْمَ [(the) Day] يَأْتُونَنَا ۖ [they will come to Us] لَـٰكِنِ [but] ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ [the wrongdoers] ٱلْيَوْمَ [today] فِى [(are) in] ضَلَـٰلٍۢ [error] مُّبِينٍۢ [clear]
data.transliteration: AsmiAA bihim waabsir yawma ya/toonanalakini aththalimoona alyawmafee dalalin mubeen

data.textUthmani: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ [And warn them] يَوْمَ [(of the) Day] ٱلْحَسْرَةِ [(of) the Regret] إِذْ [when] قُضِىَ [has been decided] ٱلْأَمْرُ [the matter] وَهُمْ [And they] فِى [(are) in] غَفْلَةٍۢ [heedlessness] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe]
data.transliteration: Waanthirhum yawma alhasrati ithqudiya al-amru wahum fee ghaflatin wahum layu/minoon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نَرِثُ [[We] will inherit] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] وَمَنْ [and whoever] عَلَيْهَا [(is) on it] وَإِلَيْنَا [and to Us] يُرْجَعُونَ [they will be returned]
data.transliteration: Inna nahnu narithu al-ardawaman AAalayha wa-ilayna yurjaAAoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ [Ibrahim] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صِدِّيقًۭا [a man of truth] نَّبِيًّا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiibraheema innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya

data.textUthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] قَالَ [he said] لِأَبِيهِ [to his father] يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] لِمَ [Why] تَعْبُدُ [(do) you worship] مَا [that which] لَا [not] يَسْمَعُ [hears] وَلَا [and not] يُبْصِرُ [sees] وَلَا [and not] يُغْنِى [benefits] عَنكَ [[to] you] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything]
data.transliteration: Ith qala li-abeehi yaabati lima taAAbudu ma la yasmaAAu wala yubsiruwala yughnee AAanka shay-a

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًا سَوِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] إِنِّى [Indeed, [I]] قَدْ [verily] جَآءَنِى [(has) come to me] مِنَ [of] ٱلْعِلْمِ [the knowledge] مَا [what] لَمْ [not] يَأْتِكَ [came to you] فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ [so follow me] أَهْدِكَ [I will guide you] صِرَٰطًۭا [(to) the path] سَوِيًّۭا [even]
data.transliteration: Ya abati innee qad jaanee minaalAAilmi ma lam ya/tika fattabiAAnee ahdika siratansawiyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] لَا [(Do) not] تَعْبُدِ [worship] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ [the Shaitaan] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ [the Shaitaan] كَانَ [is] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [to the Most Gracious] عَصِيًّۭا [disobedient]
data.transliteration: Ya abati la taAAbudi ashshaytanainna ashshaytana kana lirrahmaniAAasiyya

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ [O my father] إِنِّىٓ [Indeed, I] أَخَافُ [[I] fear] أَن [that] يَمَسَّكَ [will touch you] عَذَابٌۭ [a punishment] مِّنَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] فَتَكُونَ [so you would be] لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ [to the Shaitaan] وَلِيًّۭا [a friend]
data.transliteration: Ya abati innee akhafu anyamassaka AAathabun mina arrahmanifatakoona lishshyatani waliyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَرَاغِبٌ [Do you hate] أَنتَ [Do you hate] عَنْ [(from)] ءَالِهَتِى [my gods] يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ [O Ibrahim] لَئِن [Surely, if] لَّمْ [not] تَنتَهِ [you desist] لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ [surely, I will stone you] وَٱهْجُرْنِى [so leave me] مَلِيًّۭا [(for) a prolonged time]
data.transliteration: Qala araghibun anta AAan alihateeya ibraheemu la-in lam tantahi laarjumannaka wahjurneemaliyya

data.textUthmani: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] سَلَـٰمٌ [Peace (be)] عَلَيْكَ ۖ [on you] سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ [I will ask forgiveness] لَكَ [for you] رَبِّىٓ ۖ [(from) my Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] كَانَ [is] بِى [to me] حَفِيًّۭا [Ever Gracious]
data.transliteration: Qala salamun AAalaykasaastaghfiru laka rabbee innahu kana bee hafiyya

data.textUthmani: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ [And I will leave you] وَمَا [and what] تَدْعُونَ [you invoke] مِن [besides] دُونِ [besides] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَأَدْعُوا۟ [and I will invoke] رَبِّى [my Lord] عَسَىٰٓ [May be] أَلَّآ [that not] أَكُونَ [I will be] بِدُعَآءِ [in invocation] رَبِّى [(to) my Lord] شَقِيًّۭا [unblessed]
data.transliteration: WaaAAtazilukum wama tadAAoona mindooni Allahi waadAAoo rabbee AAasa allaakoona biduAAa-i rabbee shaqiyya

data.textUthmani: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَلَمَّا [So when] ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ [he left them] وَمَا [and what] يَعْبُدُونَ [they worshipped] مِن [besides Allah] دُونِ [besides Allah] ٱللَّهِ [besides Allah] وَهَبْنَا [[and] We bestowed] لَهُۥٓ [[to] him] إِسْحَـٰقَ [Isaac] وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ [and Yaqub] وَكُلًّۭا [and each (of them)] جَعَلْنَا [We made] نَبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Falamma iAAtazalahum wamayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi wahabna lahu ishaqawayaAAqooba wakullan jaAAalna nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We bestowed] لَهُم [to them] مِّن [of] رَّحْمَتِنَا [Our Mercy] وَجَعَلْنَا [and We made] لَهُمْ [for them] لِسَانَ [a truthful mention] صِدْقٍ [a truthful mention] عَلِيًّۭا [high]
data.transliteration: Wawahabna lahum min rahmatinawajaAAalna lahum lisana sidqin AAaliyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًا وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ [Musa] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] مُخْلَصًۭا [chosen] وَكَانَ [and was] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabimoosa innahu kana mukhlasan wakanarasoolan nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ [And We called him] مِن [from] جَانِبِ [(the) side] ٱلطُّورِ [(of) the Mount] ٱلْأَيْمَنِ [the right] وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ [and brought him near] نَجِيًّۭا [(for) conversation]
data.transliteration: Wanadaynahu min janibiattoori al-aymani waqarrabnahu najiyya

data.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We bestowed] لَهُۥ [[to] him] مِن [from] رَّحْمَتِنَآ [Our Mercy] أَخَاهُ [his brother] هَـٰرُونَ [Harun] نَبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu min rahmatinaakhahu haroona nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ [Ishmael] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صَادِقَ [true] ٱلْوَعْدِ [(to his) promise] وَكَانَ [and was] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger ] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiismaAAeela innahu kana sadiqa alwaAAdi wakanarasoolan nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَكَانَ [And he used] يَأْمُرُ [(to) enjoin] أَهْلَهُۥ [(on) his people] بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ [the prayer] وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ [and zakah] وَكَانَ [and was] عِندَ [near] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] مَرْضِيًّۭا [pleasing]
data.transliteration: Wakana ya/muru ahlahu bissalatiwazzakati wakana AAinda rabbihi mardiyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِدْرِيسَ ۚ [Idris] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صِدِّيقًۭا [truthful] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiidreesa innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ [And We raised him] مَكَانًا [(to) a position] عَلِيًّا [high]
data.transliteration: WarafaAAnahu makanan AAaliyya

data.textUthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَبُكِيًّا ۩
data.wordByWord: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] ٱلَّذِينَ [(were) the ones whom] أَنْعَمَ [Allah bestowed favor] ٱللَّهُ [Allah bestowed favor] عَلَيْهِم [upon them] مِّنَ [from (among)] ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ [the Prophets] مِن [of] ذُرِّيَّةِ [(the) offspring] ءَادَمَ [(of) Adam] وَمِمَّنْ [and of those] حَمَلْنَا [We carried] مَعَ [with] نُوحٍۢ [Nuh] وَمِن [and of] ذُرِّيَّةِ [(the) offspring] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ [(of) Ibrahim] وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ [and Israel] وَمِمَّنْ [and of (those) whom] هَدَيْنَا [We guided] وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ [and We chose] إِذَا [When] تُتْلَىٰ [were recited] عَلَيْهِمْ [to them] ءَايَـٰتُ [(the) Verses] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [(of) the Most Gracious] خَرُّوا۟ [they fell] سُجَّدًۭا [prostrating] وَبُكِيًّۭا ۩ [and weeping]
data.transliteration: Ola-ika allatheena anAAama AllahuAAalayhim mina annabiyyeena min thurriyyati adamawamimman hamalna maAAa noohin wamin thurriyyatiibraheema wa-isra-eela wamimman hadayna wajtabaynaitha tutla AAalayhim ayatu arrahmanikharroo sujjadan wabukiyya

data.textUthmani: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا
data.wordByWord: ۞ فَخَلَفَ [Then succeeded] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] خَلْفٌ [successors] أَضَاعُوا۟ [who neglected] ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ [the prayer] وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ [and they followed] ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ [the lusts] فَسَوْفَ [so soon] يَلْقَوْنَ [they will meet] غَيًّا [evil]
data.transliteration: Fakhalafa min baAAdihim khalfun adaAAooassalata wattabaAAoo ashshahawatifasawfa yalqawna ghayya

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَن [(one) who] تَابَ [repented] وَءَامَنَ [and believed] وَعَمِلَ [and did] صَـٰلِحًۭا [good (deeds)] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Then those] يَدْخُلُونَ [will enter] ٱلْجَنَّةَ [Paradise] وَلَا [and not] يُظْلَمُونَ [they will be wronged] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything]
data.transliteration: Illa man taba waamanawaAAamila salihan faola-ika yadkhuloonaaljannata wala yuthlamoona shay-a

data.textUthmani: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: جَنَّـٰتِ [Gardens] عَدْنٍ [(of) Eden] ٱلَّتِى [which] وَعَدَ [promised] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] عِبَادَهُۥ [(to) His slaves] بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ [in the unseen] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, [it]] كَانَ [is] وَعْدُهُۥ [His promise] مَأْتِيًّۭا [sure to come]
data.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin allatee waAAada arrahmanuAAibadahu bighaybi innahu kana waAAduhuma/tiyya

data.textUthmani: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
data.wordByWord: لَّا [Not] يَسْمَعُونَ [they will hear] فِيهَا [therein] لَغْوًا [vain talk] إِلَّا [but] سَلَـٰمًۭا ۖ [peace] وَلَهُمْ [And for them] رِزْقُهُمْ [(is) their provision] فِيهَا [therein] بُكْرَةًۭ [morning] وَعَشِيًّۭا [and evening]
data.transliteration: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwanilla salaman walahum rizquhum feeha bukratanwaAAashiyya

data.textUthmani: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: تِلْكَ [This] ٱلْجَنَّةُ [(is) Paradise] ٱلَّتِى [which] نُورِثُ [We give (as) inheritance] مِنْ [[of] (to)] عِبَادِنَا [Our slaves] مَن [(the one) who] كَانَ [is] تَقِيًّۭا [righteous]
data.transliteration: Tilka aljannatu allatee noorithu min AAibadinaman kana taqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] نَتَنَزَّلُ [we descend] إِلَّا [except] بِأَمْرِ [by (the) Command] رَبِّكَ ۖ [(of) your Lord] لَهُۥ [To Him (belongs)] مَا [what] بَيْنَ [(is) before us] أَيْدِينَا [(is) before us] وَمَا [and what] خَلْفَنَا [(is) behind us] وَمَا [and what] بَيْنَ [(is) between] ذَٰلِكَ ۚ [that] وَمَا [And not] كَانَ [is] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] نَسِيًّۭا [forgetful]
data.transliteration: Wama natanazzalu illa bi-amrirabbika lahu ma bayna aydeena wama khalfanawama bayna thalika wama kana rabbukanasiyya

data.textUthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا
data.wordByWord: رَّبُّ [Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between both of them] فَٱعْبُدْهُ [so worship Him] وَٱصْطَبِرْ [and be constant] لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ [in His worship] هَلْ [Do] تَعْلَمُ [you know] لَهُۥ [for Him] سَمِيًّۭا [any similarity]
data.transliteration: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma faAAbudhu wastabirliAAibadatihi hal taAAlamu lahu samiyya

data.textUthmani: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَيَقُولُ [And says] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ [[the] man] أَءِذَا [What! When] مَا [What! When] مِتُّ [I am dead] لَسَوْفَ [surely will] أُخْرَجُ [I be brought forth] حَيًّا [alive]
data.transliteration: Wayaqoolu al-insanu a-itha mamittu lasawfa okhraju hayya

data.textUthmani: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: أَوَلَا [Does not] يَذْكُرُ [remember] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ [[the] man] أَنَّا [that We] خَلَقْنَـٰهُ [We created him] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] وَلَمْ [while not] يَكُ [he was] شَيْـًۭٔا [anything]
data.transliteration: Awa la yathkuru al-insanuanna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shay-a

data.textUthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَوَرَبِّكَ [So by your Lord] لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ [surely, We will gather them] وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ [and the devils] ثُمَّ [then] لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ [surely, We will bring them] حَوْلَ [around] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] جِثِيًّۭا [bent (on) knees]
data.transliteration: Fawarabbika lanahshurannahum washshayateenathumma lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] لَنَنزِعَنَّ [surely, We will drag out] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] شِيعَةٍ [sect] أَيُّهُمْ [those of them] أَشَدُّ [(who were) worst] عَلَى [against] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عِتِيًّۭا [(in) rebellion]
data.transliteration: Thumma lananziAAanna min kulli sheeAAatinayyuhum ashaddu AAala arrahmaniAAitiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] لَنَحْنُ [surely, We] أَعْلَمُ [know best] بِٱلَّذِينَ [[of] those who] هُمْ [[they]] أَوْلَىٰ [(are) most worthy] بِهَا [therein] صِلِيًّۭا [(of) being burnt]
data.transliteration: Thumma lanahnu aAAlamu billatheenahum awla biha siliyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِن [And (there is) not] مِّنكُمْ [(any) of you] إِلَّا [but] وَارِدُهَا ۚ [(will be) passing over it] كَانَ [(This) is] عَلَىٰ [upon] رَبِّكَ [your Lord] حَتْمًۭا [an inevitability] مَّقْضِيًّۭا [decreed]
data.transliteration: Wa-in minkum illa wariduhakana AAala rabbika hatman maqdiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] نُنَجِّى [We will deliver] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ٱتَّقَوا۟ [feared (Allah)] وَّنَذَرُ [and We will leave] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers] فِيهَا [therein] جِثِيًّۭا [bent (on) knees]
data.transliteration: Thumma nunajjee allatheena ittaqawwanatharu aththalimeena feehajithiyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِذَا [And when] تُتْلَىٰ [are recited] عَلَيْهِمْ [to them] ءَايَـٰتُنَا [Our Verses] بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ [clear] قَالَ [say] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] لِلَّذِينَ [to those who] ءَامَنُوٓا۟ [believed] أَىُّ [Which] ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ [(of) the two groups] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] مَّقَامًۭا [(in) position] وَأَحْسَنُ [and best] نَدِيًّۭا [(in) assembly]
data.transliteration: Wa-itha tutla AAalayhim ayatunabayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheenaamanoo ayyu alfareeqayni khayrun maqaman waahsanunadiyya

data.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَـٰثًا وَرِءْيًا
data.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation ] هُمْ [they] أَحْسَنُ [(were) better] أَثَـٰثًۭا [(in) possessions] وَرِءْيًۭا [and appearance]
data.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humahsanu athathan wari/ya

data.textUthmani: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَن [Whoever] كَانَ [is] فِى [in] ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ [[the] error] فَلْيَمْدُدْ [then surely will extend] لَهُ [for him] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] مَدًّا ۚ [an extension] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] رَأَوْا۟ [they see] مَا [what] يُوعَدُونَ [they were promised] إِمَّا [either] ٱلْعَذَابَ [the punishment] وَإِمَّا [or] ٱلسَّاعَةَ [the Hour] فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ [then they will know] مَنْ [who] هُوَ [[he]] شَرٌّۭ [(is) worst] مَّكَانًۭا [(in) position] وَأَضْعَفُ [and weaker] جُندًۭا [(in) forces]
data.transliteration: Qul man kana fee addalalatifalyamdud lahu arrahmanu maddan hattaitha raaw ma yooAAadoona imma alAAathabawa-imma assaAAata fasayaAAlamoona man huwasharrun makanan waadAAafu junda

data.textUthmani: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًى ۗ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا
data.wordByWord: وَيَزِيدُ [And Allah increases] ٱللَّهُ [And Allah increases] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ [accept guidance] هُدًۭى ۗ [(in) guidance] وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ [And the everlasting] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ [good deeds] خَيْرٌ [(are) better] عِندَ [near] رَبِّكَ [your Lord] ثَوَابًۭا [(for) reward] وَخَيْرٌۭ [and better] مَّرَدًّا [(for) return]
data.transliteration: Wayazeedu Allahu allatheenaihtadaw hudan walbaqiyatu assalihatukhayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maradda

data.textUthmani: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: أَفَرَءَيْتَ [Then, have you seen] ٱلَّذِى [he who] كَفَرَ [disbelieved] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [in Our Verses] وَقَالَ [and said] لَأُوتَيَنَّ [Surely, I will be given] مَالًۭا [wealth] وَوَلَدًا [and children]
data.transliteration: Afaraayta allathee kafara bi-ayatinawaqala laootayanna malan wawalada

data.textUthmani: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
data.wordByWord: أَطَّلَعَ [Has he looked] ٱلْغَيْبَ [(into) the unseen] أَمِ [or] ٱتَّخَذَ [has he taken] عِندَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عَهْدًۭا [a promise]
data.transliteration: AttalaAAa alghayba ami ittakhathaAAinda arrahmani AAahda

data.textUthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّا
data.wordByWord: كَلَّا ۚ [Nay] سَنَكْتُبُ [We will record] مَا [what] يَقُولُ [he says] وَنَمُدُّ [and We will extend] لَهُۥ [for him] مِنَ [from] ٱلْعَذَابِ [the punishment] مَدًّۭا [extensively]
data.transliteration: Kalla sanaktubu ma yaqooluwanamuddu lahu mina alAAathabi madda

data.textUthmani: وَنَرِثُهُۥ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا
data.wordByWord: وَنَرِثُهُۥ [And We will inherit (from) him] مَا [what] يَقُولُ [he says] وَيَأْتِينَا [and he will come to Us] فَرْدًۭا [alone]
data.transliteration: Wanarithuhu ma yaqoolu waya/teenafarda

words.translation: and he will come to Us

data.textUthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ [And they have taken] مِن [besides Allah] دُونِ [besides Allah] ٱللَّهِ [besides Allah] ءَالِهَةًۭ [gods] لِّيَكُونُوا۟ [that they may be] لَهُمْ [for them] عِزًّۭا [an honor]
data.transliteration: Wattakhathoo min dooni Allahialihatan liyakoonoo lahum AAizza

data.textUthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
data.wordByWord: كَلَّا ۚ [Nay] سَيَكْفُرُونَ [they will deny] بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ [their worship (of them)] وَيَكُونُونَ [and they will be] عَلَيْهِمْ [against them] ضِدًّا [opponents]
data.transliteration: Kalla sayakfuroona biAAibadatihimwayakoonoona AAalayhim didda

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Do not] تَرَ [you see] أَنَّآ [that We] أَرْسَلْنَا [[We] have sent] ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ [the devils] عَلَى [upon] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [the disbelievers] تَؤُزُّهُمْ [inciting them] أَزًّۭا [(with) incitement]
data.transliteration: Alam tara anna arsalna ashshayateenaAAala alkafireena taozzuhum azza

data.textUthmani: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
data.wordByWord: فَلَا [So (do) not] تَعْجَلْ [make haste] عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ [against them] إِنَّمَا [Only] نَعُدُّ [We count] لَهُمْ [for them] عَدًّۭا [a number]
data.transliteration: Fala taAAjal AAalayhim innamanaAAuddu lahum AAadda

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًا
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] نَحْشُرُ [We will gather] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [the righteous] إِلَى [to] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] وَفْدًۭا [(as) a delegation]
data.transliteration: Yawma nahshuru almuttaqeena ilaarrahmani wafda

data.textUthmani: وَنَسُوقُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًا
data.wordByWord: وَنَسُوقُ [And We will drive] ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ [the criminals] إِلَىٰ [to] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] وِرْدًۭا [thirsty]
data.transliteration: Wanasooqu almujrimeena ila jahannamawirda

data.textUthmani: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا
data.wordByWord: لَّا [Not] يَمْلِكُونَ [they will have the power] ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ [(of) the intercession] إِلَّا [except] مَنِ [(he) who] ٱتَّخَذَ [has taken] عِندَ [from] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عَهْدًۭا [a covenant]
data.transliteration: La yamlikoona ashshafaAAatailla mani ittakhatha AAinda arrahmaniAAahda

data.textUthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَقَالُوا۟ [And they say] ٱتَّخَذَ [Has taken] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] وَلَدًۭا [a son]
data.transliteration: Waqaloo ittakhatha arrahmanuwalada

data.textUthmani: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِدًّا
data.wordByWord: لَّقَدْ [Verily] جِئْتُمْ [you have put forth] شَيْـًٔا [a thing] إِدًّۭا [atrocious]
data.transliteration: Laqad ji/tum shay-an idda

data.textUthmani: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
data.wordByWord: تَكَادُ [Almost] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ [the heavens] يَتَفَطَّرْنَ [get torn] مِنْهُ [therefrom] وَتَنشَقُّ [and splits asunder] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] وَتَخِرُّ [and collapse] ٱلْجِبَالُ [the mountain] هَدًّا [(in) devastation]
data.transliteration: Takadu assamawatuyatafattarna minhu watanshaqqu al-ardu watakhirrualjibalu hadda

data.textUthmani: أَن دَعَوْا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: أَن [That] دَعَوْا۟ [they invoke] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [to the Most Gracious] وَلَدًۭا [a son]
data.transliteration: An daAAaw lirrahmaniwalada

data.textUthmani: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] يَنۢبَغِى [is appropriate] لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [for the Most Gracious] أَن [that] يَتَّخِذَ [He should take] وَلَدًا [a son]
data.transliteration: Wama yanbaghee lirrahmanian yattakhitha walada

data.textUthmani: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًا
data.wordByWord: إِن [Not] كُلُّ [all] مَن [who] فِى [(are) in] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] إِلَّآ [but] ءَاتِى [(will) come] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [(to) the Most Gracious] عَبْدًۭا [(as) a slave]
data.transliteration: In kullu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi illa atee arrahmaniAAabda

data.textUthmani: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىٰهُمْ وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّا
data.wordByWord: لَّقَدْ [Verily] أَحْصَىٰهُمْ [He has enumerated them] وَعَدَّهُمْ [and counted them] عَدًّۭا [a counting]
data.transliteration: Laqad ahsahum waAAaddahum AAadda

data.textUthmani: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَرْدًا
data.wordByWord: وَكُلُّهُمْ [And all of them] ءَاتِيهِ [(will) come (to) Him] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ [(of) the Resurrection] فَرْدًا [alone]
data.transliteration: Wakulluhum ateehi yawma alqiyamatifarda

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believed] وَعَمِلُوا۟ [and did] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ [good deeds] سَيَجْعَلُ [will bestow] لَهُمُ [for them] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] وُدًّۭا [affection]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati sayajAAalu lahumu arrahmanuwudda

data.textUthmani: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا
data.wordByWord: فَإِنَّمَا [So, only] يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ [We (have) made it easy] بِلِسَانِكَ [in your tongue] لِتُبَشِّرَ [that you may give glad tidings] بِهِ [with it] ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ [(to) the righteous] وَتُنذِرَ [and warn] بِهِۦ [with it] قَوْمًۭا [a people] لُّدًّۭا [hostile]
data.transliteration: Fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanikalitubashshira bihi almuttaqeena watunthira bihi qawmanludda

words.translation: that you may give glad tidings

data.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًۢا
data.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We (have) destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation] هَلْ [Can] تُحِسُّ [you perceive] مِنْهُم [of them] مِّنْ [any] أَحَدٍ [one] أَوْ [or] تَسْمَعُ [hear] لَهُمْ [from them] رِكْزًۢا [a sound]
data.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin haltuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasmaAAu lahum rikza
